title: hi my friends, please what the name of two fonts
content:
please help me with this fonts

Font: 

 A safe place to fall and jenna sue 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317174220/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")

comments.content:
Just a placeholder post to prevent D.Pape from being the first to answer, he he :)

\*EDIT\*  
and now the answers:  
1. **[A Safe Place to Fall](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317174220/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-1&ffam=A%20Safe%20Place%20to%20Fall%20-%20Regular&fid=05aba64e7c55749647cb000719725a80&fsize=60&text=La%20vida%20no%20es%20facil%2C%20para&fit=1)** by Kimberly Geswein [2011, Free for personal use]

2. **[Jenna Sue](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317174220/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-1&ffam=Jenna%20Sue%20-%20Regular&fid=d3e5b970def867c75aabf138304d9035&fsize=60&text=No%20Vamos%20en%20el%20mismo%20Barco&wrap=2)** free font by Jenna Sue
Fivos!! I thought you were my friend! (Dafont fonts are fast to find.)

Ha ha... Off-course I'm your friend  
I just thought my post will make you smile :)

Why are you up so early? This is a good time for me to be here because all you guys live in some other time zone or have another life to live or fall asleep on the keyboard and give me an opening!

'night Fivos...

Font finding is a game for insomniacs :)  
Don

You are so right Don :)  
...and as a computer programmer I'm a serial insomniac
